entry.title: Palay Khan - Bollywood Action Film - Jackie Shroff, Poonam Dhillon
entry.content:
The British are in power in India. But Mandokhel is one region that they are yet to capture. Thanks to the rebels led by Palay Khan (Jackie Shroff) protecting them. All the attempts by the British to capture him have gone in vain. The British force led by Col Gulbaaz Khan manages to capture Palay Khan's best friend Amar Singh. To free him Palay Khan decides to kidnap Ellen, the daughter of the British General Bonz. But on his mother's insistence he frees her and eventually the fall in love. Palay will have to deal with strong opposition from the British. Before that he has to handle his fellow men who think the he is betraying them. Gulbaaz Khan takes advantage of the situation and lays a trap to capture Palay Khan. Will Palay Khan survive the trap to fight against the British and be with his beloved?

Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3

entry.title: Mission the Last War - Bollywood Action Film
entry.content:
Maharaja (Amrish Puri), a notorious criminal who controls the red light areas, abducts a college girl named Chanda and forces her into prostitution. Chanda's lover Krishna sets out to find her but his attempts are foiled by Maharaja. Krishna's brother Biju, an Airforce commander vows to find Chanda and his brother but fails to get a lead on Maharaja's location. He is joined by Succhi, a young man who's friend meets the same fate as Chanda. Both men unite to track down Maharaja's location and decimate his crime empire to rise supreme in the war against injustice.

Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3

entry.title: Mard Ki Zabaan
entry.content:
Ram Chauhan is a poor farmer and lives with his brother, Lakshman in a small village. He falls in love with wealthy girl Lakshmi and they decide to get married. Lakshmi's father, Raghupathi objects their union and disowns her. His anger does not subside even when Lakshmi gives birth to a son, Vijay. When Raghupathi announces that his sole beneficiary is going to be his loyal servant Shrinath, Lakshman opposes this action. Shrinath is a wicked man who wants to take over Raghupathi's wealth and manages to do so by killing Ram, separating Lakshmi and her son Vijay and in the process framing Lakshman for murder. Years later, Lakshman, still in prison, is informed that Raghupathi has been conned by Shrinath and his son, Monty; and they have hired an impersonator, who has killed Raghupathi and taken over the estate. Lakshman escapes from prison and is hell-bent on taking revenge against the men responsible for destroying his family.

entry.title: Khoon Khoon - Hindi Action Movie - Rekha, Danny Denzongpa
entry.content:
"Watch Khoon Khoon, a 1970's Bollywood action movie. This movie is an action thriller along with murder mystery sequences. A manic murdered is on the prowl in the Mumbai city. He goes about murdering people at no random order. Will the cops be able to nab this murderer? Watch out to know more. entry.title: Himmat
entry.content:
Watch the Bollywood Action film Himmat (1996) starring Sunny Deol, Tabu, Shilpa Shetty, Naseeruddin Shah, Gulshan Grover, Mohan Joshi & Mukesh Khanna. Directed by Sunil Sharma & Produced by Sangeeta Singh. Music composed by Anand-Milind.

Synopsis: The story revolves around two Indian Secret Service Agents, Abdul & Ajay who live together as family. Abdul is assigned on Project M that deals with India’s nuclear capability for defense, whereas Ajay sets of to Switzerland for a vacation. Ajay chances a meeting with beautiful Anju & falls in love with her. Soon he returns to India only to learn that Abdul was killed while working on Project M. Later he is assigned to complete the project & find Abdul’s assassins. Issues evovles when he discovers that Anju’s father is one of the masterminds behind Abdul’s assassins. Will Ajay be able to solve the case?

Subscribe and Stay Tuned – http://goo.gl/eXlZ3
